Class IndelibleFSClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.firehose.IndelibleFSClient

  • public abstract class IndelibleFSClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds IndelibleFSServers on the network and makes them available
    Author:
    David L. Smith-Uchida
